title: Phenomenological Approach for Strengthening Creative Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and foundational knowledge in instructional design
context.additional_context: Phenomenological research-based course for applying creative instructional design methodologies in mathematics education, structured as microlearning modules optimized for mobile environments

learning_goals: Learners can describe the four phenomenological categories of creativity in instructional design.
Learners can present at least three creative instructional design strategies applying a phenomenological approach to mathematics education content development.
Learners can design microlearning scenarios to implement creative instructional design in mobile learning environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
